posts.post_content:
** GREEN COBB:  SOLD
RED COBB: SOLD 

Taking offers.  PLEASE PM if interested, and please refrain for asking for a price in any post afterwards.
Intention to replace these with PSA versions. Trades are open as well.

The RED Cobb is in 'raw' and is a double name top/bottom  Polar Bear  
This card was purchase the exact same way it is currently. I have had a pleasure talking with a forum member, and it does seem it will grade, but may have troublesome corner, which may result in a slabbed 'alt' or 'authentic.
Another member says it might get a 1.5MC -2MC thru PSA. 
Updated new picture, to perhaps zooms in on the card better. 

*Pending Payment*--SOLD
The GREEN Cobb is a BVG 'alt'  Sovereign and its has great eye appeal of a good looking 3-4 perhaps. 

Again, these cards have never been sent to grade, I have been informed in my best interest to sell these both cards and just buy PSA versions for the registry
Pictures are below.

More pics:
NEW PICS BELOW(from photobucket)
Looks much more closer to the actual card, as some of my scans are not great.
[URL=http://s1240.photobucket.com/user/kylerowdybusch/media/TYCOBBRED_zps5drhh0h3.jpeg.html][IMG]http://i1240.photobucket.com/albums/gg481/kylerowdybusch/TYCOBBRED_zps5drhh0h3.jpeg[/IMG][/URL]

Green Cobb --pending payment---SOLD
Red Cobb-- still available
